source.name: Flow Description Purpose
source.instructions: **What is the primary purpose of the flow description field?**

answers.answer: To document the code for other developers
To help the LLM match user messages to the correct flow
To list all the steps in the flow

source.learningObjectives: SWBAT identify the purpose of flow descriptions
source.guidance: Flow descriptions are critical because the LLM reads them to understand what each flow does and matches user messages accordingly.
